casebody.data:
MORRIS
v.
SUPREME COURT. No. 260P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of June 2007 by Plaintiff for the judgment on the pleading:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of August 2007."
